View Javadoc
1   package org.hibernate.test.cache;
2   
3   import net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager;
4   import org.junit.BeforeClass;
5   import org.junit.Test;
6   
7   import org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.management.impl.EhcacheStatsImpl;
8   
9   import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.is;
10  import static org.junit.Assert.assertThat;
11  
12  /**
13   * @author Alex Snaps
14   */
15  public class EhcacheStatsImplTest {
16  
17  	private static EhcacheStatsImpl stats;
18  
19  	@BeforeClass
20  	public static void createCache() throws Exception {
21  		CacheManager manager = CacheManager.getInstance();
22  		stats = new EhcacheStatsImpl( manager );
23  	}
24  
25  	@Test
26  	public void testIsRegionCacheOrphanEvictionEnabled() {
27  		assertThat( stats.isRegionCacheOrphanEvictionEnabled( "sampleCache1" ), is( false ) );
28  	}
29  
30  	@Test
31  	public void testGetRegionCacheOrphanEvictionPeriod() {
32  		assertThat( stats.getRegionCacheOrphanEvictionPeriod( "sampleCache1" ), is( -1 ) );
33  	}
34  }
